title: Algeria strongly condemns terrorist attack against Malian forces in Tessit
text: Algeria strongly condemns the terrorist attack against the Malian Armed Forces in the locality of Tessit, near the region Gao, and extends its condolences to the bereaved families and wishes a speedy recovery to the wounded.
Algeria reiterates its full solidarity with the Malian government and the Malian people and expressed its full support in the fight they are waging against terrorism.
